amendment.description: To fund urgent priorities for our Nation's firefighters, law enforcement personnel, and emergency medical personnel, and all Americans by reducing the 2003 tax breaks for individuals with annual income in excess of $1,000,000.

action.text: Amendment SA 1363 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1363 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 54. Record Vote Number: 299.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1363.

Amendment SA 1363 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S9832-9847; text: CR S9832) To fund urgent priorities for our Nation's firefighters, law enforcement personnel, and emergency medical personnel, and all Americans by reducing the 2003 tax breaks for individuals with annual income in excess of $1,000,000.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1363 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 54. Record Vote Number: 299.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1363 proposed by Senator Dodd.
